snippet.title: The Serpent's Star walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - Ultrasoft/Broderbund)
snippet.description:
The Serpent's Star (http://mocagh.org/loadpage.php?getgame=serpentstar) was a graphics adventure game created by Ultrasoft and published by Broderbund in 1983 for the Apple ][. Following the adventure from The Mask of the Sun (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cn6UNnSbgVs), the player controls Mac Steele again in a quest to discover the Serpent's Star.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - mocagh.org
Walkthrough - www.mogelpower.de, The Book of Adventure Games (Kim Schuette)
